description:
PAC-MAN & Galaga Dimensions is a collection of six complete games, including four previous titles from the PAC-MAN and Galaga franchises, as well as two brand new games designed to harness the power of Nintendo 3DS.

In PAC-MAN tilt, you’ll utilise the Nintendo 3DS system’s built-in gyro sensor to guide the spherical yellow hero through inventive levels crammed with challenge. By tilting the Nintendo 3DS system you’ll alter the angle of the entire stage, causing PAC-MAN to roll at high speed and setting him up to use level elements like flippers and swings that can catapult him to new heights. It’s a whole new way to take control of one of gaming’s most famous heroes, and it’s all brought to life in glorious 3D!
name:
PAC-MAN™ & Galaga™
Dimensions
